description: A global military organization led by Monkey D. Dragon, dedicated to overthrowing the World Government. They operate from their headquarters on Baltigo, the Island of White Soil.

keyMoments.title: Robin Joins Revolutionary Army for Training
keyMoments.description: Nico Robin decides to join the Revolutionary Army and travel to Baltigo to meet Dragon and train for two years.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes a connection between Robin and the Revolutionary Army, providing her with knowledge and training that will be valuable in the future.

goals: Liberate oppressed people around the world
significance: The Revolutionary Army represents the main organized opposition to the World Government. Robin's time training with them provides her with crucial knowledge about the world's underground resistance movement.
